result.execSummary:
The defendant Adam M Swartz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Forgery [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.38(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: If probation or extended supervision is allowed to expire or is revoked with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge and provide current financial information.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for any balances due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.  Attorney Fees To Be Determined.  Probation does NOT collect attorney fees.
If unemployed or underemployed, must seek work and submit written log to the probation agent.  Must obtain and maintail full time employment.

Must have no contact with Lacey F or Jennifer K.
Must maintain absolute sobriety.
09/07/2016 AMENDED: COURT REMOVES THE CONDITION OF MUST HAVE NO CONTACT WITH JENNIFER K.

Must complete any and all evaluations, counseling, treatment and follow-up recommended by Probation Agent. Must participate in cognitive behavioral thinking program. Must submit DNA sample and pay the surcharge.
AODA and comply with recommended follow-up treatment.
08/03/16 AMENDED TO ADD RESTITUTION IN THE SUM OF $150.00 PER C-31.
